extendedInfo.description: citynaut is a mobile application that helps you explore your CITY NIGHTLIFE. (IMPORTANT: The current version has data only for HOUSTON, TX. We are currently adding more cities and more features thatâll make your nightlife less hectic and more fun...for the moment cheers and party on!)Search the bar or club of your preference and get the latest and most accurate information about your favorite hotspot. Engage your friends in the club and bar social rooms: â¢	Write reviews.â¢	Give shout outs to your friends. â¢	Share information in the social room like whatâs the current cover at a club, is it really worth the line and cover for that club, a drink someone should definitely get?â¢	 Be a good citynaut and share the knowledge. Have you ever thought:â¢	I feel like going out tonight, Iâm in the mood for music and drinks. Where should I go?â¢	I want to dance to the Top 40 songs or to some Latin music. Where are they playing those? â¢	Is there live music playing somewhere that I would like to go to? â¢	What are the people buzzing about?â¢	Is there a minimum age requirement?â¢	Does the bar or club enforce dress code?â¢	Is there cover tonight? â¢	Iâm new here. What are some of the clubs and bars around town?Definition of a citynaut:â¢	A person who uses the citynaut application automatically qualifies to be a citynaut.â¢	A citynaut is an intrepid explorer of the cityscape, especially the night life.â¢	A citynaut is a passionate reveler, who likes sharing information with other people.

reviews.title: Small startup, not bad
reviews.comment: Great app for any partying Houstonian. Has the latest data on the bar/club scene in the area.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It seems like an excellent app, but i live in miami, fl. Is this coming anytime soon?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This app is awesome! I use it every weekend thx..
